name: Space Shots
description:
Turn on your Engine,Accelerate at your best and fire on the disks A basic game with a recognizable music and some bullets to fire on your enemy but can you do that ?

The Controls may be hard or as I say Tricky so I have a help area to explore all the controls Frustrated in Quarantine, Don't worry we have some guns and some shots to feel better.

Welcome to the game where you can either Quit or Win 

There is no time to take a break and plan your shots

If you find any bugs in the game, Comment down or mail me at : aryakshat3@gmail.com
